mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weight_record ( user_id, record_date, weight, bmi, body_fat_rate, muscle_mass, bone_mass, water_rate, visceral_fat, basal_metabolism, notes, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{recordDate}, #{weight}, #{bmi}, #{bodyFatRate}, #{muscleMass}, #{boneMass}, #{waterRate}, #{visceralFat}, #{basalMetabolism}, #{notes}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM weight_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM weight_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND record_date = #{recordDate} LIMIT 1
